valworkbench.measures.internal.ConsensusC
Class ConsensusClustering

java.lang.Object
  valworkbench.measures.Measure
      valworkbench.measures.internal.ConsensusC.ConsensusClustering

public class ConsensusClustering
extends Measure

The ConsensusClustering class provides an object that encapsulates methods and states information for computing Consensus Cluster measure. This class takes in input a DataMatrix and an InputMeasure object. Values of mesaure are returned in a MeasureVector object. The effect of computing such measure is basically to find a correct number of clusters with the given algorithm A and benchmark dataset D.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Raffaele Giancarlo, Filippo Utro, Davide Scaturro
See Also:
Measure
